title: Did Biden Just Win? | Guests: Robert Cahaly & AZ Rep. Paul Gosar | 11/6/20
description:
One forecaster has called the presidency for Joe Biden, but overall, this election had very good outcomes for Republicans. Rep. Paul Gosar discusses the ongoing ballot-counting in Arizona as Trump gains on Biden. Bill O’Reilly talks recounts, election fraud, and how we can instill confidence in the process again. Chief pollster of the Trafalgar Group Robert Cahaly discusses proving the media wrong with his accurate polling predictions and what’s happening in Philadelphia. David Barton details how the House and Senate races are looking good for Republicans. The New York Times is more of a conspiracy theorist than it claims Glenn is, as proven by its new story claiming Trump’s tweets are actually secret code for his base.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
